channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - Equipment update
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 2, 04:30 - 08:30 UTC

Aug 8, 12:23 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 02/09/2024 04:30 UTC
End time : 02/09/2024 08:30 UTC
Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for some servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - Vmotion
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 12, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 14, 15:00 UTC

Aug 1, 22:33 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 12/08/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 14/08/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 12, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 14, 15:00 UTC

Jul 17, 22:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 12/08/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 14/08/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SBG3][Hosted Private Cloud] - Racks S356B06/S356B05
item.description:
Aug 7, 20:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/08/2024 16:30 UTC
End Time : 07/08/2024 20:28 UTC
Root cause :This incident was due to cooling system issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Aug 7, 18:29 UTC
Monitoring - All hosts have been migrated from the impacted to new servers.
No more impact is being observed since 16:56 UTC.
Our teams are currently working on the impacted servers.

Aug 7, 17:13 UTC
Update - No more impact is observed for servers in rack S356B05.
Our teams are currently working on the impacted servers of rack S356B06.

Aug 7, 16:53 UTC
Identified - Start time : 07/08/2024 16:30 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in racks S356B06 and S356B05 are temporarily unavailable
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private CLoud] - VMware Private Cloud
item.description:
Aug 4, 04:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/08/2024 01:10 UTC
End Time : 04/08/2024 03:30 UTC
Service impact impact : ssd-009263
Root cause : Hardware malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Aug 4, 04:01 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Aug 4, 04:01 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 4, 02:12 UTC
Identified - Start time: 04/08/2024 01:10 UTC
Service impact impact : ssd-009263
Root cause : Hardware malfunction
Ongoing actions : our team is working to fixe the issue.

item.title: [SBG3][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts incident notification
item.description:
Aug 2, 20:50 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/08/2024 17:30 UTC
End Time : 02/08/2024 20:45 UTC
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Aug 2, 19:40 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Aug 2, 18:49 UTC
Update - Some hosts are fixed, our team is working on the last ones.

Aug 2, 18:16 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 2, 18:15 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 02/08/2024 17:30 UTC
User impact : Some host are unreachable
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : SBG3
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.

item.title: [RBX2][Vmware] - Provisionning service
item.description:
Jul 25, 21:24 UTC
Resolved - Start time: 25/072024 20:00 UTC
End time: 25/072024 21:22 UTC
User impact : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause:It was due to a malfunction on a hardware.

Jul 25, 20:32 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 25, 20:32 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 25/072024 20:00 UTC
User impact : Some slowness is observed when the service needs to be provisionned.
Ongoing Actions:Investigating.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
